description: Manages a custom virtual machine image that can be used to create virtual machines.

BlobUri.description: Specifies the URI in Azure storage of the blob that you want to use to create the image.

Caching.description: Specifies the caching mode as `ReadWrite`, `ReadOnly`, or `None`. The default is `None`.

Lun.description: Specifies the logical unit number of the data disk.

ManagedDiskId.description: Specifies the ID of the managed disk resource that you want to use to create the image.

SizeGb.description: Specifies the size of the image to be created. The target size can't be smaller than the source size.

BlobUri.description: Specifies the URI in Azure storage of the blob that you want to use to create the image.

Caching.description: Specifies the caching mode as `ReadWrite`, `ReadOnly`, or `None`. The default is `None`.

ManagedDiskId.description: Specifies the ID of the managed disk resource that you want to use to create the image.

OsState.description: Specifies the state of the operating system contained in the blob. Currently, the only value is Generalized.

OsType.description: Specifies the type of operating system contained in the virtual machine image. Possible values are: Windows or Linux.

SizeGb.description: Specifies the size of the image to be created. The target size can't be smaller than the source size.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

HyperVGeneration.description: The HyperVGenerationType of the VirtualMachine created from the image as `V1`, `V2`. The default is `V1`.

Location.description:
Specified the supported Azure location where the resource exists.
Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Name.description:
Specifies the name of the image. Changing this forces a
new resource to be created.

ResourceGroupName.description:
The name of the resource group in which to create
the image. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

SourceVirtualMachineId.description: The Virtual Machine ID from which to create the image.

Tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

ZoneResilient.description: Is zone resiliency enabled?  Defaults to `false`.  Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
